description:
"The Harvest Show" is a concert where all of the different grains show off their beauty to everyone watching, and "HarveStars" is the name given to the grains who put on the best performances. In this age of rice acreage reduction policies and Westernization of eating habits, bread has become the most popular grain in Japan, and tables are dominated by "Yeast King," the bread HarveStars. But five new rice students have enrolled at Kokuritsu Inaho Academy, a school on the verge of shutting down, and they form a new group called "Love Rice" that`s practicing to beat Yeast King...
Source: crunchyroll

REGULAR.description:
Love Rice started a rice riot at the Harvest Festival and became a sensation overnight. They`ve been super busy with TV appearances, rice planting, and other activities, but the group`s leader, Hinohikari, is acting strange... Meanwhile, a new exchange student arrives at Inaho Academy, and he`s a ramen HarveStar named Sho. The members of Love Rice can`t help feeling flustered by the appearance of a new rival. What will come of the peace that had settled between the grains?
Source: crunchyroll

Hinohikari had suddenly collapsed in the classroom, worrying the other members of Love Rice. Then, after school, the door bursts open, and a new first-year named Oidemai suddenly puts on a Harvest Show. How will this passionate fan of Love Rice fit into the story? Meanwhile Yeast King, the bread HarveStar unit, is eating out with Love Rice when the waitress asks if they`d prefer bread or rice with their meals. And glaring through the window at their conversation from outside is Sho...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Based on the Original Concept, Love Rice Is Really Meant to Be Aimed at Girls
Tousho no Concept Da to Love Kome wa Ichiou Joshi Muke
当初のコンセプトだとラブ米は一応女子向け

REGULAR.description:
Morinokuma-san and Koro-nee are getting married. The usual gang is in the audience at the reception, but Hinohikari is nowhere to be found. A comment from Morinokuma-san`s students and a Harvest Show by Koshihikari bring the celebration to joyful new heights, until Morinokuma-san gets a phone call...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: スクールハーベスター・ラブライス

REGULAR.description:
After receiving the phone call, the gang rushes to Hinohikari`s side to find him burnt to a crisp. It seems he`s fallen ill from pushing himself too hard because the next event for the busy and popular Love Rice is drawing near... and he`s been told that he has no chance of performing.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Legendary Six Rice Boys (Mixed Rice)
幻の6人米[シックスライス]

REGULAR.description:
It`s the day of OniSummer. Oidemai successfully fills in for the ailing Hinohikari, and the "new Love Rice" is able to put on its Harvest Show. Then everything suddenly goes dark, and Sho comes flying into the venue on a giant noodle bowl. Everyone is stunned as Sho launches into his Harvest Show, "Mendependence Day"...
Source: crunchyroll

Ramen`s popularity has skyrocketed at Inaho Academy ever since Sho`s "Mendependence Day" Harvest Show at OniSummer. Two weeks have passed since Hinohikari disappeared, leaving the other Love Rice members worried. Then both Sho and Koshihikari appear in front of them, and Koshihikari suggests that the two HarveStars settle their conflict with an "uel"...
Source: crunchyroll

Love Rice is in a celebratory mood after their victory in the uel and the return of Hinohikari. Then Koshihikari arrives, and he seems troubled. It turns out he`s decided to make a movie starring Sasanishiki! Hinohikari, Hitomebore, Akitakomachi, and Nikomaru are all on board, but Sasanishiki is less thrilled. Will they be able to complete the filming?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 踊り! 炊き走査線 The Movie

REGULAR.description:
One morning, as Nikomaru is getting ready for school, Akitakomachi shows up at his door carrying a lost  baby named Rinx Kobayashi. Akitakomachi says he found the baby in a rice cooker on his way to school. The two of them decide to take care of Rinx Kobayashi together, and through much trial and error, they try their hardest to be good parents.
Source: crunchyroll

One night, Chinkobozu and Manamuzume are gazing at a shining comet as it streaks across the night sky. Then they go to sleep... and awaken to find that they`ve switched bodies? They`re forced to remain in that state while Manamusume goes to kindergarten and Chinkobozu takes the stage for a live performance. How will these two very different people overcome this crisis?
Source: crunchyroll

Students from Inaho Academy and St. Pan High School are disappearing one after another, and now the gang can`t even get in touch with Oidemai or Rinx Kobayashi. Then the concerned members of Love Rice are confronted by Sho, who`s acting very strange. As Sho launches his attack, the next to appear before them is...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: それゆけ! ケーキング

REGULAR.description:
Love Rice and CaKing are bewildered when two Shos stand before them. But one of the two is actually Non-carb, who`s trying to impose a carbohydrate-free diet on the world.  His attacks have been aimed to make all the grains fight each other, eventually wiping themselves out. Indeed, the grains begin to disappear one after another to the beams Non-carb emits. Finally, he stands face-to-face with Love Rice...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nise Shou no Shoutai wa Tansuikabutsu Nuki Diet
The Fake Sho Is Really a Carbohydrate-Free Diet
偽ショウの正体は炭水化物抜きダイエット

REGULAR.description:
Hinohikari`s continuous cropping damage and Oidemai`s disappearance weren`t orchestrated by Sho; it was all the work of Non-carb, an enemy so overwhelmingly powerful that he wiped out Koshihikari. Love Rice attempts to fight back with a rice shower... but can they ever hope to defeat Non-carb? The battle to protect the peace between rice, bread, and noodles reaches its conclusion!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Love Kome: We Love Rice Nikisaku
ラブ米 -WE LOVE RICE- 二期作
爱米 -WE LOVE RICE- 第二季
